group_1.textRight: Having considered all your desires, I've put@together a flawless solution!
Since this is a special project, I think we@should do something extraordinary.
Instead of limiting ourselves to a@garden-variety video this time,
why don't we do something that@incorporates direct fan engagement?

group_1.textLeft: Considering how deeply Sayu-Sayu cares about@her fans, that would be very appropriate.
Agreed. It's a special feature, so we should@involve them somehow.
I knew you'd come up with an idea like that, Ria!@You're incredible at envisioning things others can't!

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* But of course!
But that's not all! I know exactly how to get@that fan engagement.
I propose we do..."The Mizuna Swimsuit Collection!"
It'll be a fashion show where fans participate@in swimsuits!

group_1.textCenter: Welcome, everyone, and thank you all for coming...
...to Sayu-Sayu's Slice-n-Dice Mizuna Travelogue@Swimsuit Collection Show!
I'm Sayuki Fumino, your beloved blade-bearing@beauty, here with you today...in my swimsuit!
The winner of today's fashion event will receive...
Oh - oh my goodness–! It's a sword forged by none other than the one and only Kamigiri!
I don't plan on losing here! So let's all have a@great time togetheeer!
And after the show, I'll be performing for you live,@in a concert featuring water sprays to cool us off!
Now, given that it's a fashion show,
I think it's clear who the winner will be...
...you may as well hand over the prize to me right@now! Ohohohohoho…!

group_1.textRight: A fashion show with Sayu-Sayu...
I don't think we can do that.

group_1.textLeft: but since it's Sayuki we're talking about, the concert@will draw more attention than the actual event.

group_1.textRight: Hmph...
Then perhaps we could make the fashion@show an opening act of sorts!
I'll ensure that it all goes off without a hitch!

group_1.textLeft: We've also done the water spray gimmick before.

group_1.textRight: What...?

group_1.textLeft: But the idea of fan engagement is brilliant.
And if we hadn't done it before,
the water spraying idea is one I would have@jumped on right away.
Have you been studying these sorts of things?

group_1.textRight: W-well… I'll be spreading my wings into@the world sooner or later, after all...
What about you, Mayu? Have you thought of@anything?
Right. Sayuki isn't in what I would call a...@coherent state, you see.

group_1.textCenter: Ahh... A sword by Kamigiri... I have to get my hands@on it somehooow...!
Please...please, oh pretty please, give me a good@idea...! Give me a good idea...PLEASE!

group_1.textRight: ...Who exactly is she praying to?

group_1.textLeft: Uh...erm...the god of "pretty please," I guess?

group_1.textRight: Does a god like that even exist...?
But let's not get off-base here. Give us@a plan, Mayu!
